IMAGE is implemented as an R package, which can be installed from either GitHub or CRAN.

# 1. Install from GitHub
```{r}
library(devtools)
install_github("3211895/IMAGE")
```
# 2. Install from CRAN
```{r}
install.packages('IMAGE')
```
